top.title: EU suspends approval of US trade deal
top.summary: The move follows renewed tensions between the US and EU, as Donald Trump pushes to acquire Greenland.

top.title: Seven more countries agree to join Trump's Board of Peace
top.summary: Seven Muslim-majority countries publicly accept an invitation to Trump's new organisation, joining Albania, Bahran, Hungary, Morocco and Israel.

top.title: Israeli strike in Gaza kills three journalists, first responders say
top.summary: Another eight Palestinians were killed by Israeli artillery and gunfire across Gaza on Wednesday, according to medics.

top.title: Snap settles social media addiction lawsuit ahead of trial
top.summary: TikTok, YouTube and Meta remain defendants in the case, which is due to kick off next week.

top.title: UK consulting on bringing in social media ban for under 16s
top.summary: The government said it expected schools to be "phone-free by default" as a result of the announcement.

top.title: How crypto criminals stole $700 million from people - often using age-old tricks
top.summary: As crypto wealth continues to grow, criminals are mixing sophisticated hacks with deception, and in some cases, real life violence.

title.#text: Samsung Galaxy S26 battery pack leak points to Qi2 charging support
Volvo aims for an EV reset with the new EX60 crossover
Ubisoft cancels Prince of Persia remake as part of major reorganization
